Odoo Advance Search

Date Range in Advanced Search

After configured daterange use can search date or datetime type of field with daterange. Module will give to separate search box for add range.


Date or Datetime Field in Advance Searching

For Date or Datetime search module will give as date picker for select date. For datetime as well it shows date picker and its display all records of selected date.

Multi Search with Group By

Using this modue we can use more then one search domain at a time. Also we can use group by with these advance search domains.
